name: Liberty (IAPSOP)
content:
Liberty (IAPSOP) About Archives Practices Contribute Contacts Search     Periodical: Liberty Summary:  From Pat Deveney's database: Liberty. Not the Daughter But the Mother of Order / The Pioneer Organ of Anarchism. 1881—1907 Monthly Boston, MA. Editor: Benjamin R. Tucker, Stephen Pearl Andrews, co-editor. 1/1, 1881-1907. This was Tucker’s very influential individualist anarchist journal. It is included here because so many spiritualists participated: Andrews, Juliet Severance, Lois Waisbrooker, et al. Tucker also assisted in editing Ezra Heywood’s The Word. Issues:Liberty V1 1881-1882 Liberty V2 1882-1883 Liberty V3 1884-1885 Liberty V4 1886-1887 Liberty V5 1887-8 Liberty V15 1906 Liberty V16 1907 Liberty V17 1908 Partial
